Posts.Content: BCT2013 wrote: Hi, All I had my BMX in May and B sentinel nodes, and B TE.  I have scars from drains and surgeries which are very red and tender.  I have tried message and and just cetaphil and aquaphor.  Message helps with tenderness.  They are still red and very noticible.  I have seen online that silicone patches can help.  Any good products that people have tried and found to be helpful?  Much appreciate any input! Dx 4/17/2013, DCIS, Grade 2 Surgery 5/9/2013 Lymph node removal: Left, Right; Mastectomy: Left, Right; Reconstruction (left): Tissue expander placement; Reconstruction (right): Tissue expander placement Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Scar, Scar, GO AWAY!? BCT2013 BCT2013
